Cost of Freedom

A Collective Inquiry

The Book : Collective Memory | OPENING: FREEDOM | ARCHITECTONICS OF POWER | AFFORDANCES | Epilogue : Credits

ARCHITECTONICS OF POWER

Barriers to freedom and how we as a society eventually deal with them or fail to do so

  • Hacking the Contradictions, by Stéphanie Vidal
  • Time to Wake Up, by Mushon Zer-Aviv
  • The Cost of Internet Freedom, by Geert Lovink
  • Why I Choose Privacy, by Sabrina Banes
  • Why I Choose Copyright, by Lucas Gonze
  • Why I Refused My Proprietary Self, by Adam Hyde
  • Image, Identity, Attribution, Authorship, by Christopher Adams
  • The Burden of Journalism, by Théophile Pillault
  • Architecture = Power, by Stéphanie Vidal
  • From Outer Space, by Niki Korth
  • Free Software Economics, by hellekin, jaromil, radium, grothoff
  • Beyond Capitalism, by hellekin
